The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 11 January is 2,705,964 (4,807.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 06 January, there were 354,232 new confirmed cases (629.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 30 December, there were 295,591 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 20% (58,641 extra cases).
